entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who is helping Dumbledore and trying to get them out of the cave.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A character who is injured and needs Harry's help to escape the cave.

entities.name: archway
entities.description: A passage or entrance that can be sealed or reopened, which plays a crucial role in their escape plan.

relationships.description: Harry is helping Dumbledore to escape the cave by wiping his grazed forearm and trying to Apparate them both back.
The archway reopened instantly after Harry wiped his grazed forearm upon the stone, which had received its tribute of blood.
